it
Class TrianglePoint

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--it.PointShape
        |
        +--it.TrianglePoint
public final class TrianglePoint
extends PointShape

This class provides a simple triangle point drawing shape for the point markers in a graph. The centre of the triangle is where the point is. The triangle is an equiliateral triangle.
